#summary &cdot; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cdot;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Cdot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/010a/index.htm U+0010A].
  * `&cdot;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/010b/index.htm U+0010B].
